page.title: 16RELIGION IN GRINDLETON AREA
page.content: There are 5 sites in the area concern- ed with religious activity,all either C.ofE.or METHODIST FREE CHURCH. (1)SAINT CATHERINE'S CHURCH,W.BRADFORD, (C.of E.)SD743446,opened 1896,within the Parish of WADD'TON AND W,BRADFORD, replacing an earlier mission chapel room,SD742444.(2)W.BRADFORD METHODIST FREE CHURCH,SD745444,opened 1904,repla- cing an old chapel,now demolished, (graveyard existing),SD740446,of the Whalley Methodist Circuit.(3)SAINT AMBROSE'S CHURCH,GRIN'TON,(C.of E.), SD762457 opened in 1805,replacing an earlier chapel of 1709,(demolished), SD761462.(4).GRIN'TON METHODIST FREE CHURCH,SD759458,opened 1863,(replacing others at RODHILL,SD760479,(1735),and BROOM HILL,SD757471,(1848).(5).CHRIST CHURCH,CHATBURN,(C.of E.),SD770443, dating from about 1838.There are no other denominations represented.
